item.title: Summing up Droidcon Berlin - Community Day
item.description: Droidcon this year was the first time I attended a conference. I want to share what it was like and give a small summary on the talks and workshops I’ve attended. I will only summarize the most important take aways of each talk and provide some links with more information. I just want to share what I found interesting and provide some way to get kicked off with a topic. üëè Summary Community Day The first day of Droidcon was all about getting engaged.
